name: blue-carbon-registry
description: Blockchain-powered Blue Carbon Registry & MRV System

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:contracts
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:contracts"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mumbai
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run compile:contracts

author: Blue Carbon Team
